Control Name: Develops and Implements Communication Protocols for Security Incidents—Protocols for communicating security incidents and actions taken to affected parties are developed and implemented to meet the entity's objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Develops and Implements Communication Protocols for Security Incidents—Protocols for communicating security incidents and actions taken to affected parties are developed and implemented to meet the entity's objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
